## ğŸš€ PR Checklist

Before submitting, please ensure you have:

*   [ ] Opened an associated issue.
*   [ ] Read the contributing guidelines.
*   [ ] Squashed and rebased your commits onto the latest `main` branch.
*   [ ] Ensured all tests pass (`pytest`).
*   [ ] Linted your code (`ruff check --fix`).
*   [ ] Formatted your code (`ruff format`).
*   [ ] Updated documentation if necessary.
*   [ ] Added or updated unit tests.
*   [ ] Reviewed the AI Agent Directives in `.github/AGENTS.md` and ensured compliance.
